title: Rogers internet issues? (canada)
body:
Hey im based in ottawa and like ive called my iSP (rogers) a few times now and they say their is no issue on their end. Anything going on on riots end? as far as server problems or something to do wit rogers and league? Because my ping just shot up 40 from what its supposed to be and my upload/download speed is fine.
TLDR:
Ping was 25 few hours ago is now staying at 60+ all of a sudden.. dont know why this is happening.. but league is the only game that this happens with.

replies.body: Could you try running a quick traceroute to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 for me using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)? That'll be able to give me an idea of where the ping issues are coming from and what you should do to next!
